summary:
Ik ben een gedreven en enthousiaste young professional die begin 2023 zijn Masteropleiding 'Organisation Studies: Complexity & Dynamics' in combinatie met een traineeship 'met genoegen' heeft afgerond.
Met een achtergrond en interesse in inzichten in de human side of business, houd ik me graag bezig met het inrichten, sturen en veranderen van organisaties en de (samen)werking binnen en tussen organisaties waarbij de mens centraal staat. 
Door uiteenlopende (werk)ervaringen gedurende mijn opleiding en in o.a. de onderwijssector en consultancy heb ik mijn kennis en vaardigheden vergroot op het gebied van teamwork, project management, strategisch management, gedrag, organisatiedynamieken en -ontwikkeling, coaching en training en het begeleiden van verbeterprocessen.

profile_positions.description: As a member of the Advisory Board (Raad van Advies) I help the current board of the association in outlining their policy plan, to coordinate their actions towards succesful execution of that plan and with overall tips for improvement throughout the year.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board Member

profile_positions.description:
As a member of the Battle Committee, I was concerned with organizing several activities and events throughout the year for all active members of our association. These activities were geared towards increasing interpersonal collaboration, teamwork, involvement within the association, and enhancing the social relationships between our members. 
In my role as secretary I'm in charge of all administrative tasks and supporting the chairman. I keep the minutes, set up to-do lists and make sure all tasks are finished in a timely manner.
profile_positions.title: Committee Secretary

profile_positions.description: As a member of the TOP-Committee, I help with the promotion of Study Association POLIS to fist-year students, during the introduction week (Tilburg Orientation Program) in Tilburg. This is done by hosting and facilitating several promotion and recruitment activities.
profile_positions.title: Executive Committee Member

profile_positions.description:
As a member of this committee, I was concerned with organizing several events aimed at improving social relations and bonding of our members.
In my role as secretary I'm in charge of all administrative tasks and supporting the chairman. I keep the minutes, set up to-do lists and make sure all tasks are finished in a timely manner.
profile_positions.title: Committee Secretary

profile_positions.description:
As a member of the Lustrum Committee, I am actively involved in planning and organizing the 6th Lustrum of Study Association POLIS, in honour of its 30th birthday. The Lustrum consists of two weeks filled with both formal and informal activities.
In my role as secretary I'm in charge of all administrative tasks and supporting the chairman. I keep the minutes, set up to-do lists and make sure all tasks are finished in a timely manner.
profile_positions.title: Committee Secretary

profile_positions.description: As a member of this pool, I take and guide prospective students to lectures to show them what a day as a student Organization Studies / Global Management of Social Issues is like. Next to that, I provide them with information regarding the subjects, the study and the life of a student at Tilburg University.
profile_positions.title: Member Student-for-a-day-pool

profile_positions.description:
As a member of the Study Related Taskforce I was concerned with the development of several supporting informational documents for students within this association.
I was particularly involved in developing a document outlining all possibilities for our students after passing their first year of our Bachelor program, like minor courses, master programs, and exchange possibilities. I also made an inventarisation of all parties students can go to for support and help for personal, professional or study related issues.
profile_positions.title: Executive Committee Member

profile_positions.description: As a member of this pool, I coach and support other students regarding any study-related issues they experience.
profile_positions.title: Member Student Coach Pool

profile_positions.description: As a member of the BylawCommittee, I helped revising, restructering and improving the fundamental bylaws of Study Association POLIS.
profile_positions.title: Executive Committee Member

profile_positions.description: As an executive committee member within the MemberweekendCommittee, I help organizing this year's weekend full of activities, games and events for all students of Study Association POLIS (Organisation Studies / Global Management of Social Issues).
profile_positions.title: Executive Committee Member

profile_positions.description:
As chairman of the SportsCommittee I organized three different sport-related events, aimed to increase the social cohesion within the association. One of the events is also focused on including the staff of the department of Organisation Studies within the association, to further develop the connection between students and staff in a more informal manner.
Being a chairman means I have the responsibility to set and lead meetings, set the agenda, and keep the overall planning in check. Furthermore, I have to make sure that all tasks are divided (equally) and finished on time, and that during activities and events everything runs smoothly. I also deem it important to create a positive and warm environment, where all members feel free and speak up, in order to encourage creativity and productivity
profile_positions.title: Chairman Committee

profile_positions.description: As an executive committee member of the Introduction Committee, I had the shared responsibility to organize a weekend for first-year Organsation Studies students and Gloabal Management of Social Issues students. This includes taking care of the location and the activities and events during and before this weekend. This way, we strive to give to give these students a great kick-off of their academic career.
profile_positions.title: Executive Committee Member

profile_positions.description: Als secretaris van de alumnivereniging ben ik verantwoordelijk voor de interne (leden) en externe (universiteit en partners/externen) communicatie, het bijhouden van de administratie en bewaken van het overzicht en de uit te voeren taken binnen ons bestuur.
profile_positions.title: Secretary

profile_positions.description:
Om de theoretische kennis uit mijn Bachelor en Master verder te kunnen laden en mijn masterscriptie van een praktische inslag te voorzien, heb ik bij Lean Instituut @ Verbeeten een traineeship gevolgd. Hierbij heb ik me verdiept in het Lean-gedachtegoed en verschillende Lean-tools, (continu) verbeterprocessen binnen teams en organisaties, het organiseren en faciliteren van verbetertrajecten en de veranderkundige- en gedragscomponenten die hierbij komen kijken. Zo heb ik mijn kennis verbreed en praktijkervaring opgedaan met thema's als continu verbeteren, procesverbetering, samenwerking, projectmanagement, organisatieontwikkeling, training en coaching.
Daarnaast heb ik mezelf enorm kunnen uitdagen en ontwikkelen door de verschillende interne projecten die ik aan kon pakken en de begeleiding en kansen die ik gedurende het jaar kreeg. Zo heb ik mijn Lean Yellow Belt en Green Belt gehaald en ben ik voor beide graden opgeleid om hier ook training en coaching in te bieden.
profile_positions.title: Lean Trainee

profile_positions.description:
As Platform Project Leader (Brand Ambassador) for Uni-Life in Tilburg, I have been responsible for rolling out this new and inventive platform at Tilburg University.
In my role, I was in contact with the management of Tilburg University, the Marketing & Communications department of Tilburg University and with all associations. Amongst others, I hosted workshops, uploaded events and worked on collaborations with associations and a succesful marketing campaign with Tilburg University.
Additionally, as the company was still in its start-up phase, I had the privilege of gaining a unique insight in how such organizations develop, grow, and professionalise over time. Together, we realised several new partnerships, both domestically and abroad.
profile_positions.title: Brand Ambassador (Platform Projectleider)

profile_positions.description: Als ontwikkelingsdirector binnen het driekoppige directorsteam van vestiging Tilburg & Eindhoven ben ik niet alleen gedeeld verantwoordelijk voor de algemene vooruitgang van onze vestiging, maar houd ik me in het bijzonder bezig met de persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling van onze consultants. Ik organiseer hiervoor het opleidingsweekend en ontwikkelingsdagen, voer regelmatig ontwikkelingsgesprekken en faciliteer wekelijkse trainingen en consultancy-gerelateerde opdrachten. Daarnaast beheerde ik de portefeuilles Marketing en Diversiteit & Inclusiviteit en was ik begeleidend director bij een van de projecten, waarbij ik het team en de projectleider regelmatig coachte op hun traject.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description: De Kleine Consultant is de grootste door studenten gerunde non-profit strategieconsultant in Nederland. Door te werken voor echte bedrijven, en zo een echte impact te kunnen maken, doe ik veel praktijkervaring op als (strategy) consultant, onder begeleiding van training en coaching door top-tier strategy consultancy kantoren als Kearney, BCG, Bain & Company, McKinsey & Company, Strategy& en EY-Parthenon. Daarnaast staat mijn persoonlijke leercurve centraal omtrent de ontwikkeling van zowel soft- als hard skills. In projectrondes van tien weken werk ik intensief samen met mijn projectgroep om gedegen onderzoek te doen om zo tot aanbevelingen te komen waar de klant echt wat mee kan.
profile_positions.title: Strategy Consultant

profile_positions.description:
FRONT is the largest student party in Tilburg University's University Council. They represent the interests of active students and are committed to issues like internationalisation, digitalisation and the living campus.
During the academic year of 2019/2020 I was 'lijstduwer' (included on the voting ballot, but in an unelectable position) - in a bid to attract more votes.
As an active member in the political pool, I strive to give input, feedback and information, to make sure the interests of students at Tilburg University are well-represented and that the students are heard in the University Council.
profile_positions.title: Active member (Political Pool)

profile_positions.description:
As a tutor for (mostly) high-school students, I provide tutoring and supporting services in several subjects, and I assist and help in planning activities and working efficiently.
It is very interesting to work with different scheduling, learning, and working styles. Working and dealing with these different styles also offer a reflection on and insight in my own way of working and learning styles.
The individual approach during the coaching and guidance sessions enables me to really go in-depth and ensures quality.
profile_positions.title: Tutor (Bijles en Huiswerkbegeleiding)

profile_positions.description:
StudentsPlus is a tutor agency that offers individual guidance and tutoring services at home. With this wide variety, we reach out to as many students as possible, and try to cover all requests. The service is customer-oriented, and focused on the wants and needs of every individual.
As location manager of Tilburg, I am responsible for the development for the company's activity in Tilburg. Using various ways, I make sure people are aware and informed of the possibilities at StudentsPlus.
I am concerned with and actively engaged in recruitment, selection, and hiring of new tutors. One of my primary activities consists of interviewing starting tutors. I assess the functioning of the prospective students, and provide them with information regarding their work activities at StudentsPlus.
Furthermore, I initiate and maintain contact with high schools (middelbare scholen) and institutions for higher education (hoger onderwijs, HBO / WO) in Tilburg and surroundings.
Lastly, I help distributing promotional material for prospective tutors and students who need extra lessons.
profile_positions.title: Location Manager

profile_positions.description: As a representative of the academic community in the context of 'Strategy 2027', I took part in a discussion with several stakeholders and the full Executive Board on how the future of the university should be shaped, keeping developments and interests for all stakeholders in mind. I contributed to the broad and varied image the Executive Board acquired for the envisioned future of our university, by giving input on the design of outlines of their proposed strategy and voicing relevant student concerns.
profile_positions.title: Student Representative

profile_positions.description:
Als werkstudent bij de Belcampagne van Tilburg University (Marketing & Communication University Services) ben ik opgeleid en heb ik me ingezet voor Stichting Universiteitsfonds Tilburg. Dit fonds steunt initiatieven die de impact van mijn universiteit vergroten, door middel van extra financiële mogelijkheden voor onderzoek, onderwijs en beurzen. 
Na een intensief opleidingsweekend bestond mijn bijdrage uit het bellen van alumni en het documenteren van deze gesprekken. Zo kon ik namens onze instelling de warme band met alumni vasthouden en konden we samen bijdragen aan het maken van een wezenlijk verschil. 
Tijdens deze campagne heb ik mogen bijdragen aan het ophalen van een nieuw recordbedrag.
profile_positions.title: Werkstudent Belcampagne

profile_positions.description:
By using student evaluations, feedback, input, and questions, I try to guarentee the quality of the education program studies.
Each study program at Tilburg University has an Educational Committee (in Dutch: Opleidingscommissie, OLC). This important body consists of the Director of Education, and an evenly divided number of staff and student members. As representative of all Organisation Studies students, I am part of the student-body of this committee, as appointed by the Dean. By voicing program matters from the student perspective, we advise on Teaching and Examination Regulations (TER, in Dutch: Onderwijs- en examenregeling, OER), and give solicited and unsolicited advise to the Director of Education on all matters concerning the educational program. Additionally, we also have to give consent regarding some formal changes within our study program.
profile_positions.title: Student Representative | Member Education Committee

profile_positions.description:
The idea behind foundation WAT (Word Actief Tilburg | We Activate Tilburg) is that being a student is not only about studying. By informing and encouraging students to become active next to their studies, we strive to contribute to develop and/or improve their personal and professional skills.
As a chairman of this foundation, I am responsible for setting and leading meetings, setting the agenda, and keeping the overall planning in check. Furthermore, I have to make sure that all tasks are divided (equally) and finished on time, and that during activities and events everything runs smoothly. I also deem it important to create a positive and warm environment, where all members feel free and speak up, in order to encourage creativity and productivity.
As face of the foundation, I am present at several promotional events (like open days) of higher professional education institutes and the university and I am a member of the 'Werkgroep Zichtbaarheid Verenigingen' (workgroup 'Visibility of Associations'), where we discuss the visibility of associations during the COVID-19 pandemic with all relevant stakeholders, such as the management team of Tilburg University, the municipality of Tilburg and boards of associations.
profile_positions.title: Chairman

volunteer_experiences.description: In my function as student mentor I guided and supported first year students throughout their first academic year at university.
In my function as student mentor I guided and supported first year students throughout their first academic year at university.
As a member of the volunteering staff during the TOPweek, I was engaged in several activities and events during the Tilburg Orientation Program (TOP) for prospective students.
As a runner, I volunteer during the biggest sing-along event of the Netherlands.

As an active member in my neighbourhood, I volunteer in several activities. Mainly guiding activities and games at King's Day, and playing 'Zwarte Piet' at the annual 'Sinterklaasfeest' for all kids of the neighbourhood. Besides that, I am involved in the establishment of the 'Oppasclub', to connect supply and demand.
As a referee for youth soccer matches at a.f.c. Eindhoven, it was my responsibility to guide the games and enforce the official KNVB rules.
